Every now and then there arises an
issue of such far-reaching implications or
such potential ,divisiveness that it becomes
the function of an objective news organ to
step in and sort out what's what.
You all know what I'm talking
about.

each other, and a lot of needless emotional

secretaries who work in Garland Hall;
top-level administrators walking in stone

Student Council members uncharacteristically at odds with one another. We understand the stakes are high — but is it worth
it?

about.

Student Council members uncharacteristically at odds with one another. We understand the stakes are high — but is it worth
it?

the head-to-head conflict here, and that is
by examining carefully the ingredients of
both arguments; not merely by traversing
the periphery of each without attending to
the gaping hole left in the .center by protagonists on both sides. We need to lay out

display case, so to speak, and look at
